body: Ok, I sent my app 7 days ago and the ref applications closed 3 days ago. Pel said he will send replys out soon but I still haven't received one. Am I being inpatient or has it not sent through?
body_tagged: Ok, I sent my app 7 days ago and the ref applications closed 3 days ago. Pel said he will send replys out soon but I still haven't received one. Am I being inpatient or has it not sent through?
title: My ref application [NEED A SR MOD OR ADMIN]

replies.body: This is for the officials. Not Sr.Mods or Admins.
replies.body_tagged: This is for the officials. Not Sr.Mods or Admins.

replies.body:
The applications became closed for entries three days ago. That doesn't necessarily mean all replies would be through by then. c:

Will wait for tournament staff correction just incase, though.
